item.title: New npc.java string help

item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

was written by shangtsung a long time ago, and it’s for… i forgot the name of the server but it’s not directly compatible with easyrsc unless you make a bunch of changes.

item.title: New npc.java string help
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

Im trying to add this to my server but keep getting lots of error messages - to many to read (tryed setting up an error log but just creates an empty log after it has finished compiling)

Can anyone see anything that im missing - been looking at the code to long now.

This is complete code(not my code using another code that was released and i think was created by xEnt?) :

[code]package org.rscdaemon.server.npchandler;

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Npc;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.World;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.ChatMessage;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.MenuHandler;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.ShortEvent;
import org.rscdaemon.server.util.Formulae;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.;
import org.rscdaemon.server.event.;

public class Expguy implements NpcHandler
{
public static final World world = World.getWorld();
world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) {
public void action() {
owner.setBusy(false);
private final String[] menu = new String[]
{
“Attack”,
“Strength”,
“Defense”,
“Magic”,
“Ranged”,

};

world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) {
public void action() {
owner.setBusy(false);
private final String[] menu2 = new String[]
{
“2.5k 25pts”,
“50k 500pts”,
“100k 1000pts”,
“1000k 10000pts”,
“Take all”,
};
public void handleNpc(final Npc npc, Player player) throws Exception {

	player.informOfNpcMessage(new ChatMessage(npc,"Hello,i can exchange your points to experience."));
  		   player.setBusy(true);
			world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(player) {
		owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(options) {
				public void handleReply(final int option, final String reply) {
					if(owner.isBusy()) {
						return;
					}
					owner.setBusy(true);
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {
						public void action() {
							owner.setBusy(false);
							if(option == 0) {

attack(affectedNpc,player);
} else
if(option == 1) {
strength(affectedNpc,player);
} else
if(option == 2) {
defense(affectedNpc,player);
} else
if(option == 3) {
magic(affectedNpc,player);
} else
if(option == 4) {
ranged(affectedNpc,player);

							} else
							{
								sayMessage("None of those thanks.", player);
								player.setState(MobState.IDLE);
								affectedNpc.setState(MobState.IDLE);
							}
						}
					});
				}
			});
	}
public void attack(final Npc affectedNpc, final Player player) {

sayNpcMessage(“How much of experience?”, affectedNpc, player);
world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new DelayedOptionsMenu(player, mainmenu2, 1200) // 1.2 sec delay
{
public void action()
{
owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(menu)
{
public void handleReply(final int option, String response)
{

							int points1 = 0;
							int points2 = 0;
							int points3 = 0;
							int points4 = 0;
							int points5 = 0;
							if(option == 0 && player.getPoints() > 24) {
										if (player.getMaxStat(0) >= 125)
									{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
									return;
									}
								} else {
								if (player.getMaxStat(0) >= 125)
								{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
								return;
								}
								}
							points1 = player.getPoints() - 25;
  							player.incExp(3, 2500 / 3);
  							player.incExp(0 ,2500);
							player.setPoints(points1);
							player.getActionSender().sendStats();
							} else
							if(option == 1 && player.getPoints() > 4125) {
									if (player.getMaxStat(0) >= 125)
									{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
									return;
									}
								} else {
								if (player.getMaxStat(0) >= 125)
								{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
								return;
								}
								}
							points2 = player.getPoints() - 500;
  							player.incExp(3, 50000 / 3);
  							player.incExp(0 ,50000);
							player.setPoints(points2);

player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 2 && player.getPoints() > 1259) {
if (player.getMaxStat(0) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
} else {
if (player.getMaxStat(0) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
}
points3 = player.getPoints() - 1000;
player.incExp(3, 100000 / 3);
player.incExp(0, 100000);
player.setPoints(points3);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 3 && player.getPoints() > 125125) {
if (player.getMaxStat(0) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
} else {
if (player.getMaxStat(0) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
}
points4 = player.getPoints() - 10000;
player.setPoints(points4);
player.incExp(3, 1000000 / 3);
player.incExp(0, 1000000);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 4 && player.getMaxStat(0) > 5) {
points5 = player.getPoints() + player.getExp(0) / 100;
player.setPoints(points5);
player.incExp(3, -player.getExp(0) / 3);
player.incExp(0 ,-player.getExp(0));
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
player.checkEquipment();
} else
{
sayMessage(“I don’t have enought points sorry.”, player);
player.setState(MobState.IDLE);
affectedNpc.setState(MobState.IDLE);
}
}

					});
				}
			});
	}
public void strength(final Npc affectedNpc, final Player player) {

sayNpcMessage(“How much of experience?”, affectedNpc, player);
world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new DelayedOptionsMenu(player, mainmenu2, 1200) // 1.2 sec delay
{
public void action()
{
owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(menu)
{
public void handleReply(final int option, String response)
{

							int points1 = 0;
							int points2 = 0;
							int points3 = 0;
							int points4 = 0;
							int points5 = 0;
							if(option == 0 && player.getPoints() > 24) {
								if (player.getMaxStat(2) >= 125)
									{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
									return;
									}
								} else {
								if (player.getMaxStat(2) >= 125)
								{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
								return;
								}
								}
							points1 = player.getPoints() - 25;
  							player.incExp(3, 2500 / 3);
  							player.incExp(2, 2500);
							player.setPoints(points1);
							player.getActionSender().sendStats();
							} else
							if(option == 1 && player.getPoints() > 4125) {										if (player.getMaxStat(2) >= 125)
									{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
									return;
									}
								} else {
								if (player.getMaxStat(2) >= 125)
								{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
								return;
								}
								}
							points2 = player.getPoints() - 500;
  							player.incExp(3, 50000 / 3);
  							player.incExp(2, 50000);
							player.setPoints(points2);

player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 2 && player.getPoints() > 1259) {
if (player.getMaxStat(2) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
} else {
if (player.getMaxStat(2) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
}
points3 = player.getPoints() - 1000;
player.incExp(3, 100000 / 3);
player.incExp(2, 100000);
player.setPoints(points3);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 3 && player.getPoints() > 125125) {
if (player.getMaxStat(2) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
} else {
if (player.getMaxStat(2) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
}
points4 = player.getPoints() - 10000;
player.setPoints(points4);
player.incExp(3, 1000000 / 3);
player.incExp(2, 1000000);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 4 && player.getMaxStat(2) > 5) {
points5 = player.getPoints() + player.getExp(2) / 100;
player.setPoints(points5);
player.incExp(3, -player.getExp(2) / 3);
player.incExp(2, -player.getExp(2));
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
player.checkEquipment();
} else
{
sayMessage(“I don’t have enought points sorry.”, player);
player.setState(MobState.IDLE);
affectedNpc.setState(MobState.IDLE);
}
}
});
}
});
}
public void defense(final Npc affectedNpc, final Player player) {
sayNpcMessage(“How much of experience?”, affectedNpc, player);
world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new DelayedOptionsMenu(player, mainmenu2, 1200) // 1.2 sec delay
{
public void action()
{
owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(menu)
{
public void handleReply(final int option, String response)
{

							int points1 = 0;
							int points2 = 0;
							int points3 = 0;
							int points4 = 0;
							int points5 = 0;
							if(option == 0 && player.getPoints() > 24) {
									if (player.getMaxStat(1) >= 125)
									{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
									return;
									}
								} else {
								if (player.getMaxStat(1) >= 125)
								{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
								return;
								}
								}
							points1 = player.getPoints() - 25;
  							player.incExp(3, 2500 / 3);
  							player.incExp(1, 2500);
							player.setPoints(points1);
							player.getActionSender().sendStats();
							} else
							if(option == 1 && player.getPoints() > 4125) {
									if (player.getMaxStat(1) >= 125)
									{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
									return;
									}
								} else {
								if (player.getMaxStat(1) >= 125)
								{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
								return;
								}
								}
							points2 = player.getPoints() - 500;
  							player.incExp(3, 50000 / 3);
  							player.incExp(1, 50000);
							player.setPoints(points2);

player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 2 && player.getPoints() > 1259) {
if (player.getMaxStat(1) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
} else {
if (player.getMaxStat(1) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
}
points3 = player.getPoints() - 1000;
player.incExp(3, 100000 / 3);
player.incExp(1, 100000);
player.setPoints(points3);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 3 && player.getPoints() > 99) {
if (player.getMaxStat(1) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
} else {
if (player.getMaxStat(1) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
}
points4 = player.getPoints() - 10000;
player.setPoints(points4);
player.incExp(3, 1000000 / 3);
player.incExp(1, 1000000);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 4 && player.getMaxStat(1) > 5) {
points5 = player.getPoints() + player.getExp(1) / 100;
player.setPoints(points5);
player.incExp(3, -player.getExp(1) / 3);
player.incExp(1, -player.getExp(1));
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
player.checkEquipment();
} else
{
sayMessage(“I don’t have enought points sorry.”, player);
player.setState(MobState.IDLE);
affectedNpc.setState(MobState.IDLE);
}
}
});
}
});
}
public void magic(final Npc affectedNpc, final Player player) {
sayNpcMessage(“How much of experience?”, affectedNpc, player);
world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new DelayedOptionsMenu(player, mainmenu2, 1200) // 1.2 sec delay
{
public void action()
{
owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(menu)
{
public void handleReply(final int option, String response)
{

							int points1 = 0;
							int points2 = 0;
							int points3 = 0;
							int points4 = 0;
							int points5 = 0;
							if(option == 0 && player.getPoints() > 24) {
								if (player.getMaxStat(6) >= 125)
								{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
								return;
								}
							points1 = player.getPoints() - 25;
  							player.incExp(6, 2500);
							player.setPoints(points1);

player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 1 && player.getPoints() > 4125) {
if (player.getMaxStat(6) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
points2 = player.getPoints() - 500;
player.incExp(6, 50000);
player.setPoints(points2);

player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 2 && player.getPoints() > 1259) {
if (player.getMaxStat(6) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
points3 = player.getPoints() - 1000;
player.incExp(3, 100000 / 3);
player.incExp(6, 100000);
player.setPoints(points3);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 3 && player.getPoints() > 125125) {
if (player.getMaxStat(6) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
points4 = player.getPoints() - 10000;
player.setPoints(points4);
player.incExp(6, 1000000);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 4 && player.getMaxStat(6) > 5) {
points5 = player.getPoints() + player.getExp(6) / 100;
player.setPoints(points5);
player.incExp(6, -player.getExp(6));
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
player.checkEquipment();
} else
{
sayMessage(“I don’t have enought points sorry.”, player);
player.setState(MobState.IDLE);
affectedNpc.setState(MobState.IDLE);
}
}
});
}
});
}

public void ranged(final Npc affectedNpc, final Player player) {

sayNpcMessage(“How much of experience?”, affectedNpc, player);
world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new DelayedOptionsMenu(player, mainmenu2, 1200) // 1.2 sec delay
{
public void action()
{
owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(menu)
{
public void handleReply(final int option, String response)
{

							int points1 = 0;
							int points2 = 0;
							int points3 = 0;
							int points4 = 0;
							int points5 = 0;
							if(option == 0 && player.getPoints() > 24) {
								if (player.getMaxStat(4) >= 125)
								{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You cannot add anymore points to this skill");
								return;
								}
							points1 = player.getPoints() - 25;
  							player.incExp(4, 2500);
							player.setPoints(points1);

player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 1 && player.getPoints() > 4125) {
if (player.getMaxStat(4) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
points2 = player.getPoints() - 500;
player.incExp(4, 50000);
player.setPoints(points2);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 2 && player.getPoints() > 1259) {
if (player.getMaxStat(4) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
points3 = player.getPoints() - 1000;
player.incExp(4, 100000);
player.setPoints(points3);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 3 && player.getPoints() > 125125) {
if (player.getMaxStat(4) >= 125)
{ player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You cannot add anymore points to this skill”);
return;
}
points4 = player.getPoints() - 10000;
player.setPoints(points4);
player.incExp(4, 1000000);
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
} else
if(option == 4 && player.getMaxStat(4) > 5) {
points5 = player.getPoints() + player.getExp(4) / 100;
player.setPoints(points5);
player.incExp(4, -player.getExp(4));
player.getActionSender().sendStats();
player.checkEquipment();
} else
{
sayMessage(“I don’t have enought points sorry.”, player);
player.setState(MobState.IDLE);
affectedNpc.setState(MobState.IDLE);
}
}
});
}
});
}
}[/code]

Im using easyrsc source if that helps…

Thanks for looking
